content.en: Optimizing 3D Networks: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the performance and efficiency of 3D network-on-chip systems. They are using algorithms to address issues such as peak temperature, network competition, thermal problems, network congestion, traffic imbalance, power and temperature optimization, and thermal management. These algorithms aim to reduce temperature, improve routing, and balance traffic in order to enhance the overall functioning of these systems.
content.da: Optimering af 3D-netværk: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af 3D-netværk-på-chip systemer. De bruger algoritmer til at adressere problemer som maksimal temperatur, netværkskonkurrence, termiske problemer, netværksbelastning, trafikubalancer, strøm- og temperaturoptimering samt termisk styring. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at reducere temperaturen, forbedre routing og balancere trafikken for at forbedre den samlede funktion af disse systemer.
